summary: Diff adds a React+TS+Tailwind single-page marketing layout with navbar, hero, features, how-it-works, roadmap, FAQ accordion, and footer, plus a warm amber/orange dark theme. However, the required generated image assets are not shown as added under frontend/public/assets/generated, and feature icons sprite usage is not evident. The diff also introduces Internet Identity/react-query/backend scaffolding and strongly trading-focused copy that was not requested and conflicts with stated non-goals.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add required static generated images to frontend/public/assets/generated and use them in the homepage (logo, hero illustration, feature icons sprite, background pattern).
missing_requirements.reason: Components reference images under /assets/generated, but the diff does not show any files added under frontend/public/assets/generated. Also, the required feature-icons sprite is not shown being used; features appear to use lucide-react icons instead.
evidence: frontend/src/components/Sections.tsx (references /assets/generated/hero-illustration.dim_1400x900.png and /assets/generated/bg-pattern.dim_1600x1600.png; uses lucide-react icons for features)
File diff summary (ADDED FILES list does not include frontend/public/assets/generated/*)

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity authentication/provider and authenticated actor/react-query scaffolding added even though auth was not required for this marketing site.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest states Internet Identity is the only supported auth but "not required for this marketing site unless explicitly requested later"; diff adds InternetIdentityProvider and hooks regardless.
evidence: frontend/src/main.tsx (wraps app with InternetIdentityProvider and QueryClientProvider)

hallucinated_features.description: Backend canister stub added (Motoko actor) despite no backend requirements for the marketing site.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses on frontend marketing website; no backend work requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Marketing content describes/markets token trading, wallets, fees, margin trading, staking, NFT marketplace, and other financial/product features.
hallucinated_features.reason: Non-goals explicitly exclude token trading, wallets, staking, on-chain transactions, or any financial features; the site copy and roadmap heavily emphasize these.
evidence: frontend/src/components/FAQAccordion.tsx (trading platform, fees, funding wallet, withdrawals, mobile trading apps, supported tokens)
frontend/src/components/Sections.tsx (CTA "Start Trading", trading/volume stats, copy about trading/managing tokens)
frontend/src/components/RoadmapTimeline.tsx (margin trading, staking rewards, DEX launch, mobile wallet, fiat on-ramp, custody, AI trading tools)

hallucinated_features.description: Social media icon integration via react-icons added without being requested.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request social link icons specifically (only footer with link groups).
